listitem.para: Built-in editor spell-checker plugin for file manager FAR.
It is useful for everyone write above one word in built-in editor. And for OCR guys who like FAR.
Hunspell from OpenOffice.Org used as spell-checking engine. Therefore this plugin can use MySpell and Hunspell dictionaries.
Download recent version from here.
Major features:
Optional misspelling word highligting.
Show suggestion word list for word correction.
Misspeling search.
Optional saving basic settings per file.
FarSpell written in C++ and FARPlus library used.
Compiler(s): Microsoft VC.

listitem.para: Development kit for dialogs written in Dialog Desctiption Language (Dialog Resource.) DialogExpress contains a library for reading and parse Dialog Resource, tool for transform Dialog Resource to any programming language, and plugin for instant visualization of resources. DialogExpress can be used for dynamic dialog loading.
Devoted to FAR Manager/plugin developers.
Written in pure C. Resource Parser compiled as static and shared library.
Compilers(s): GNU project C compiler, Microsoft VC.
